x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description:
From Tokyo the stats on Standard Change Request templates and their versions are calculated by a daily job (sysauto_script "Calculate Standard Change Template and Template Version statistics") which replaces the equivalent functionality provided by business rules:
Update Standard Change Version stats Update Standard Version stats on delete
For upgrading customers if the above 2 BRs have not been modified then this fix script deactivates them.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Disable legacy standard Change stats BRs
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.sys_name: Disable legacy standard Change stats BRs
